meta_description: Welcome to Art Gallery Mississauga. Explore local art, exhibitions, and events that celebrate creativity and cultural diversity.
hours_text:
### Location

The AGM is located inside the Civic Centre building at 300 City Centre Drive, across the street from Square One Mall and the Living Arts Centre.

Entrance to the building is at Princess Royal Drive. If the doors are locked, please ring for security. The gallery is located at the south east corner of the ground floor.

**Parking Information**

[Street](http://web.archive.org/web/20251229133711/https://www.mississauga.ca/portal/residents/paidparking) | [Underground](http://web.archive.org/web/20251229133711/https://www.mississauga.ca/portal/residents/offstreetpaidparking)

### Directions

**From Toronto:** QEW west to Hwy 10 (Hurontario St.). North on Hurontario Street to Burnhamthorpe Road. West on Burnhamthorpe Road to Living Arts Drive. North on Living Arts Drive. Or: Hwy 401 west to Hwy 10 (Hurontario St). South on Hurontario to Burnhamthorpe Road. West on Burnhamthorpe Road. North on Living Arts Drive.

**From Hamilton:** QEW east to Hwy 10 (Hurontario St.) North on Hurontario Street to Burnhamthorpe Road. West on Burnhamthorpe Road to Living Arts Drive. North on Living Arts Drive. Or: QEW east to Hwy 403 (by Ford Dr). East on Hwy 403 to Centreview/Mavis exit. Take Centreview exit to Duke of York. South on Duke of York to Rathburn Road. West on Rathburn Road to Living Arts Drive. South on Living Arts Drive.

**GO Transit:
